tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in just four events during the year with his best finish coming in late June when he closed with a 4-under-par 66 to T20 at the U.S. Senior Open in Sacramento...Was T39 at the Mitsubishi Electric Championship at Hualalai and T40 at the Senior Open Championship...Missed the cut at the Senior PGA Championship.

tourBios.otherVics: (2): 1990 Kansai Pro Championship. 1993 NST Niigata Open.
tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in just four events during the year with his best finish coming in late June when he closed with a 4-under-par 66 to T20 at the U.S. Senior Open in Sacramento...Was T39 at the Mitsubishi Electric Championship at Hualalai and T40 at the Senior Open Championship...Missed the cut at the Senior PGA Championship.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Played just 12 events, which included a T22 at The Principal Charity Classic, his best finish of the season.

 2013: Earned a majority of his earnings in his first four starts and finished 32nd on the final money list in his 12 starts...Surprised the golf world in May when he won the Senior PGA Championship at Bellerive CC near St. Louis. The win came in his first visit to the United States. Started Sunday's final round five strokes behind 54-hole leader Kenny Perry, but posted a bogey-free, 6-under-par 65 Sunday to overtake Perry and win by two strokes. Became the first player to win the event in his first try since Michael Allen did so four years earlier...Finished 13th at The Senior Open Championship at Royal Birkdale in July...Later added a T23 at the U.S. Senior Open in Omaha.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played on the Japan Golf Tour for more than 20 years and achieved two victories...His first career win came in 1990 when he birdied his final hole to win the Kansai Pro Championship by one stroke....Second win came three years later where despite a final-round 74, he posted a three-stroke victory at the NST Niigata Open...Led the Japan Golf Tour in Driving Accuracy for 10 years...Won the Fujifilm Senior on the Japan Senior Tour in 2012.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions in 2016 is T23rd at the Mitsubishi Electric Championship at Hualalai.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 82nd in Charles Schwab Cup Money List on the PGA TOUR Champions.
